XenotypeDef.label: Atlantic
XenotypeDef.description: When the bombs fell, the East Coast’s dense cities became tombs of glass and steel. Those who endured the fallout adapted to life in shattered high-rises and flooded metro tunnels. The Atlantic people are resourceful, tech-savvy scavengers who learned to thrive amidst rust, rain, and radiation. They speak with the echo of a thousand pre-war voices, clinging to fragments of the old world’s ambition.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Urban survivors from the irradiated ruins of the East Coast, hardened by concrete jungles and endless storms.
